title: [Large-scale] Integrative Understanding of Spirituality and Learning: Reflective Learning Design through a Scientific Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational scientific knowledge and learning theories
context.additional_context: For adult learners in science fields, systematically exploring the interaction between spirituality and learning. Conducting blended classes that combine digital and analog activities in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain key characteristics of spirituality (e.g., self-reflection, transcendence, meaning-seeking) in relation to the learning process.
Learners can propose experimental designs that integrate spiritual elements into scientific research methodologies.
Learners can evaluate the interaction mechanisms between spirituality and learning through case analysis and develop strategies applicable to educational settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
